name: [ DEMO ] The Lost Tribe
description:
Welcome to The Lost Tribe, an RPG inspired by Guarani-folklore.
Play as Peri, an adventure trying to make his way through the forest.
Use his sword to quickly end the enemies, or atack then in their balance spot to avoid combat.

Inputs:

M1 - Drag / Attack
W - Move Foward / Intimidate
A - Move Leftward / Rotate counter-clockwise
S - Move Downward / Flee awawy
D - Move Rightward / Rotate clockwise

Credits:

Unicorn Heads - URL Melt

Raging Streets - SelfChol

YT library - Sound effects

https://www.twitch.tv/fiveluskas
